Text:
Please someone translate this book into English!

I'm very interested in this story.


TIA

Hyperwords translated the title as

Harry Potter and the Torch with the Green Flames

so I'll be looking for a title with the words Green Flames in it, I guess.

For those of you who don't know, Hyperwords is a Firefox add-on for automatic translations. If you need stuff translated, I strongly suggest you get it.

Bye.
Maybe i can try to translate it to english in the christmas holidays, depends on how long it takes me. I go to a bilingual school so i can guarantee it will be a good translation.
